children.value: A German student-run nonprofit initiative that I co-run. SbS has about 1000 active members providing free tuition to children from underprivileged families as well as - more recently - refugees in over 20 university towns all over Germany. Our goal is to thereby contribute to more equal educational opportunities for all disadvantaged members of society.
We used to have a really old-school
-powered homepage. That's all in the past now, luckily. Instead, we now sport a shiny new
's fast CDN. It's amazing how much awesome infrastructure and service you get for free these days!
